title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Integrated Social-Emotional Learning (SEL) and Restorative Justice (RJ) Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Propose at least three instructional design strategies for integrating SEL core competencies (self-awareness, relationship skills, etc.) into math class activities.

Learners apply restorative justice principles (empathic dialogue, accountability, harm repair) to draft action plans for three healthcare conflict cases following a 5-step conflict resolution process: problem definition → stakeholder analysis → solution generation → implementation planning → evaluation criteria setting.
Develop a rubric to evaluate the effectiveness of an integrated education model and derive improvement plans incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
